tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE clothing_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_reviews (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE clothing_items (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255),
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    released_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    rating INT NOT NULL,
    comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES clothing_items(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ClothingItems (
    item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    brand_id UUID,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES ClothingBrands(brand_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    item_id UUID,
    rating INT CHECK (rating >= 1 AND rating <= 5),
    comments TEXT,
    review_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (item_id) REFERENCES ClothingItems(item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE BrandsFeedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id UUID,
    feedback TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (brand_id) REFERENCES ClothingBrands(brand_id)
);
